attributes.action: no longer give blue badge disabled drivers free crossing on the severn Bridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is discrimination againt able bodied people.  Disabled people can still work full time and earn a wage plus get all the benefits that able bodied people cannot claim. Therfore they should pay the same as any other road user to use the bridge.  If people are capable of driving a car then they are capable of putting their hands in their pockets and paying like everyone else.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
